article: The parents have two boys. One is fourteen years old, the other is sixteen years old. One day the parents went on a trip for the weekend with friends. They left early  _ Friday morning, and left the boys at home. That evening the boys _ their dad's car to see a movie. They _ a good time. After the movie _ , they got back to the car. They saw a big hole   at the  _ of the car. They were terrified   and asked someone to fix   the car. After that they drove it back _ . Their parents came back on Sunday, but the boys didn't tell them about the hole _ they were too terrified. The father went out in his _ . When he came back, he was _ and said to the family, "Someone drove _ the back of my car on Thursday and now it is fixed well!"
